abstract: A collection of the 2012 presidential candidates' third-quarter fund-raising reports, filed with the Federal Election Commission.
snippet: A collection of the 2012 presidential candidates' third-quarter fund-raising reports, filed with the Federal Election Commission.
lead_paragraph: 5:12 p.m. | Updated The 2012 presidential candidates must file their third-quarter fund-raising reports with the Federal Election Commission by Saturday at midnight. The numbers will reveal not merely how much they are raising, but how much they are spending and where they are spending it. The chart below is a top-level breakdown of where the candidates stand, and will be updated as candidates reports become available.)
